DOC.brief_title: Indirect Effects Pneumococcal Vaccine Nasopharyngeal Carriage
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study assess indirect effect pneumococcal conjugate vaccine administer infant vaccinee ' elder non-vaccinated sibling age 3 7 year . This study include cross-sectional sample nasopharyngeal oropharyngeal swabs 2011 register-based follow-up study invasive disease , hospital-diagnosed pneumonia , tympanostomy tube surgery outpatient antimicrobial treatment .
DOC.criteria: age 3 7 year young sibling least 12 month age live household participates FinIP 053 trial ( regardless vaccination schedule ) least one parent fluent Finnish inform consent one parent commercial PCV vaccination administer studyrelated PCV vaccination administer ( open blind ) history antimicrobial treatment within 4 week ( child enrol later )
